devdoc.details: This contract must NEVER hold funds!Maliciously crafted transaction payloads could wipe out any funds left here

callWithSyncFeeV2(address,bytes,bool,byt.details: This is the most straightforward use case, and `transfer` handles token payments.

params._correlationId: Unique task identifier generated by gelato
params._isRelayContext: true: all relay context encoding, false: only feeCollector encoding

devdoc.title: Gelato Relay contract

callWithSyncFeeV2(address,bytes,bool,byt.notice: Relay call with Synchronous PaymentThe target contract pays Gelato during the call forward

userdoc.notice: This contract deals with synchronous payments and Gelato 1Balance payments
